task.title: Viewing the remote syslog server configuration by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view the remote syslog server configuration details by using the show RemoteLogServer command.

step.cmd: To view the remote syslog server configuration details, enter the following command:

info.note: The command must be capitalized as shown.

taskbody.example: The following example shows the remote syslog server configuration: show RemoteLogServer Driver = syslog-tcp Host = 192.160.24.1 Port = 512 Enabled = true
